description: You don't have to be on a plant-based diet to enjoy these delicious vegan wraps of sweet chilli-glazed tofu and crunchy vegetables encased in a soft tortilla.
keywords: Wrap,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Budget,Summer,Vegetarian,Mar 2021,Quick & easy lunch,Autumn,Dinner Made Easy,Tofu
name: Vegan Sweet Chilli Tofu Wraps Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small red onion, thinly sliced into rounds
1 continental cucumber, deseeded, cut into 10cm lengths

recipeInstructions.text: Place onion and vinegar in a bowl. Season with a pinch of sugar and salt. Add 1/4 cup water and stir to combine. Set aside.

Meanwhile, cut tofu into 8 slices. Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook tofu, turning, for 5 minutes or until golden and warmed through. Add sauce and turn to coat. Remove from heat.
Meanwhile, make slaw according to packet instructions. Drain onion.
Place wraps on bench. Divide slaw, cucumber, tofu and onion among wraps. Drizzle with pan juices and scatter over peanuts. Roll to enclose filling and serve.
